data.title: Twin words
data.statement:
Please try to solve the exercise first without reading statement (encoded with ROT13). Imagine that you are solving this exercise in reverse mode.

Tvira n fragrapr, qbhoyr nyy jbeqf va n fragrapr naq frcnengr qbhoyrq jbeqf jvgu n ulcura.

Sbe rknzcyr, vs fragrapr pbagnvaf jbeq "tb", gura gur qbhoyrq jbeq jvyy or "tb-tb".

testCases.title: Several sentences
testCases.testIn: The first sentence? The second sentence! And the last sentence...
testCases.testOut: The-the first-first sentence-sentence? The-the second-second sentence-sentence! And-and the-the last-last sentence-sentence...

testCases.title: Several sentences
testCases.testIn: The rabbit hole went straight on like a tunnel for some way, and then dipped suddenly down. So suddenly that she had not a moment to think about stopping herself before she found herself falling down what seemed to be a very deep well.
testCases.testOut: The-the rabbit-rabbit hole-hole went-went straight-straight on-on like-like a-a tunnel-tunnel for-for some-some way-way, and-and then-then dipped-dipped suddenly-suddenly down-down. So-so suddenly-suddenly that-that she-she had-had not-not a-a moment-moment to-to think-think about-about stopping-stopping herself-herself before-before she-she found-found herself-herself falling-falling down-down what-what seemed-seemed to-to be-be a-a very-very deep-deep well-well.

data.constraints:
Gurer jvyy or ab jbeqf juvpu ner vgfrys pbagnvaf ulcuraf, sbe rknzcyr, "k-enl" jvyy abg nccrne va grfgf.

Cebcre anzrf (be cebcre abhaf) ner abg hfrq.

Jbeq pbagenpgvbaf yvxr `jba'g` vafgrnq bs `jvyy abg` ner abg hfrq.

Gur yratgu bs fragrapr jvyy abg rkprrq 255 punenpgref.
data.inputDescription: N fragrapr, juvpu jbeqf ner gb or qbhoyrq.
data.outputDescription: Gur fnzr fragrapr, ohg jvgu gur jbeqf qbhoyrq.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Please try to solve the exercise first without reading statement (encoded with ROT13). Imagine that you are solving this exercise in reverse mode.

Tvira n fragrapr, qbhoyr nyy jbeqf va n fragrapr naq frcnengr qbhoyrq jbeqf jvgu n ulcura.

Sbe rknzcyr, vs fragrapr pbagnvaf jbeq "tb", gura gur qbhoyrq jbeq jvyy or "tb-tb".
Input
N fragrapr, juvpu jbeqf ner gb or qbhoyrq.
Output
Gur fnzr fragrapr, ohg jvgu gur jbeqf qbhoyrq.
Constraints
Gurer jvyy or ab jbeqf juvpu ner vgfrys pbagnvaf ulcuraf, sbe rknzcyr, "k-enl" jvyy abg nccrne va grfgf.

Cebcre anzrf (be cebcre abhaf) ner abg hfrq.

Jbeq pbagenpgvbaf yvxr 
jba'g
vafgrnq bs 
jvyy abg
ner abg hfrq.

Gur yratgu bs fragrapr jvyy abg rkprrq 255 punenpgref.
Example
Input
go
Output
go-go
